  • Classes in InventoryManagement used by InventoryManagement
    Class
    Description
    Inventory
    Manages the inventory of medicines.
    Medicine
    Represents a medicine in the inventory, including details such as ID, name, stock, threshold, and price.
    Specialisation
    Represents various specializations for medical staff and doctors.
  • Classes in InventoryManagement used by MainApp
    Class
    Description
    Inventory
    Manages the inventory of medicines.
    Pharmacist
    Represents a Pharmacist who manages prescriptions, dispenses medicines, handles inventory replenishment requests, and monitors stock levels.
